name: Arguantis - ArcherDefenderV1.2
description:
This Game is made by :

Florian Charlety

This is my first exported project, feel free to give me feedback !

For :
5-days game jam
The GameJam theme is :
Gravity

You play an Hero-Archer defending his city with magicals empowered arrows from skeletons wich want to kill YOU 

IMPORTANT : If you experiment Hard-lags, consider lowering the shadows in options, they are kinda costfull actually for some setups, Working on it !

Original GameJamVersion (EnnemiesBugged) :
https://nairolfri.itch.io/arguantis-archer-defender
(Additionnal Debug/AdjustementsTime : 1day).
Now enemis attacks and arrows can touch them 100% of nicely aimed times !
